mainEntity.name: How do I know if a crash casino is licensed?

mainEntity.name: What is provably fair in crash gambling?

acceptedAnswer.text: Provably fair systems use cryptographic hashes to prove game outcomes weren't manipulated. Look for casinos that show seed keys, allow client seed generation, and provide hash verification tools.

mainEntity.name: What should I do if a crash casino refuses my withdrawal?
